thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Bank of Baroda to stop operating in South Africa on March 31

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bank of Baroda to stop operating in South Africa on March 31
text:
JOHANNESBURG, Feb 12 (Reuters) - The South African unit of Indiaâ€™s Bank of Baroda will stop operating in South Africa at the end of March as part of its strategic plan to rationalize the branches in international markets, the lender said on Monday.
The local branch will stop taking new deposits and disbursing loans with effect from March 1, and cease to operate and conduct the business of a bank in South Africa from March 31, it said in a statement. (Reporting by Nqobile Dludla; Editing by James Macharia)
